messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:Teletubbies&Mr. Rogers
messages.msgSnippet: I used to think of Mr. Rogers as a man who was nice in a world full of people who weren t.  He showed me at a verrry early age that there are good people in
messages.messageBody:
I used to think of Mr. Rogers as a man who was nice in a world full of
people who weren't. He showed me at a verrry early age that there are
good people in the world who treat others with respect and even listen
to children. Yes, he would pause after asking a question, like he was
waiting for your response. And I find Teletubbies to have a relaxing
effect. It's so quiet. Kind of silly for adults and older children, but
small children relate to it. It does something for them.
Bonni
